name: DEVILISH BOOM
description: This is a great level for both deathmatch and single player. You'll love the design and detail and the traps... I designed this level to make it essencially enjoyable, not like those stupid WADs where you have to keep saving your game and planning your attack. "Ya gotta run if ya wanna stay alive" as I always say... This can already be considered a final version, but should you find any bugs, please do mail me... This is the 1st of the 4 level sequel to "Satanic DooM", my first set of four levels everybody loved...
